case.state: Are you trying to freak me out? P-Please put some pants on.
Hey now! Y-You're coming on a little too strong, ~player~.
D-Don't just show up like that! Go put a shirt on, ~player~!
Are you sure you don't wanna cover up, ~player~? You're gonna be at a disadvantage...
Hahaha. Very funny, ~player.ifMale(sir|miss)~.
W-Wha...? Why would you call yourself that?
Season's bleedings!
Dwelf reporting for duty!
F-Finally, I can relax for a bit... Oh! I'm Dwight, by the way.
Uh, Dwight Fairfield. That's my name, I mean. So... nice to meet you, ~player~.
Oh, um... Hello, Meg.
T-The Legion! Oh my god, I left my flashlight at the campfire. W-What do I do!?
Hey... What's up with the weapon!? Is it really necessary to bring?
That's an easy one. Bloodthirsty killers, that's it. Mhm... nothing else.
This is the type of relaxation I need. The holidays are always so stressful...
A break from dying, and from running a Twitter account? Of course I'm down.
Survivors poker night, then? I'm happy to play with you all, if that's what you'd like!
Survivor poker night, huh? Sure thing, I'd be happy to join you guys!
Oh... J-Just the three of us? That's fine with me, if it's okay with you guys...
No hooks in sight! Of course I'll join you, ~player~. Uh, if that's okay.
Thanks for having me! I don't get to go out much, you know? {small}Hahaha...{!reset}
Oh, wow! No new cards needed here!
I won't need any new cards, t-thanks though.
I don't need to swap any cards, thanks.
I think I'll just need one changed.
Just one should do it...
Uh, I think I'll only switch out this one...
Um, I'll be good with just ~cards.text~ new cards.
Can I swap ~cards.text~ of these...?
~Cards.text~... Yeah, ~cards.text~ should be fine.
Uh... Oh! Sorry, just ~cards.text~ new cards.
P-Please give me ~cards.text~ new cards...
I'm really banking on these ~cards.text~ new cards...
Oh, god. Just ~cards.text~ should be fine, right?
T-These ~cards.text~ will be much better! I-I'm sure of it!
Just ~cards.text~ new cards, please.
Uh, ~cards.text~ new cards should do it.
I think ~cards.text~ will be just fine...
~Cards.text~ new cards, if that's okay...
~Cards.text~ new ones, I think.
Oh! Maybe we could have a guys night back at the campfire and play this with one another! I know Ace has a deck of cards.
I'm getting better at meeting new people, if you can believe it. It's a leader's job to greet and explain everything to anyone new.
I hope I haven't been complaining too much to you. I don't get to just... talk. Usually I'm busy hiding in a locker.
Campfires are super homely, aren't they? They really melt away your stress.
Looking good, Dwight.
The plus of being a pizza boy was the free meal with each shift. PizzaWhat! is pretty damn good.
My buddy told me to "let my heart out of the locker". What does that mean? Was he trying to make fun of me for being single?
Claudette's taught me a bunch about botany and flowers. Now I know not to eat poison ivy!

The other trial, Meg looped the killer for like... four gens. Hahaha! He was so pissed!
Uh, did any of that make sense?
All survivors have something great in them, really. Even the ones that are mean to me, like Yun-Jin.
Everyone back at the campfire... I'm so proud of them! I'm real lucky to get to know such great people.
Can't relax, can't unwind...
It's pretty great to talk to Laurie Strode. I mean, how many people fight a serial killer with nothing but a sewing needle and actually live?
We don't really need to eat in the Fog... But I-I miss it so much! I want pizza, pancakes, cookies... I want junk food!
Brave and unyielding... that's what a leader should be... Like Jake. I've never met someone as capable as him, or as stubborn.
There's this older guy, Ace. He's insanely lucky, especially with gambling. Really, I should have asked him for advice before this.
Are you sure these are my cards? They look too good to be mine.
Oh, do they play music here? I'd love to go dancing! I-I'm no good, but it's really fun...
Alright!
It's been, what... six years since I've been able to eat pizza? Isn't that depressing?
I hate being called into trials. But, sometimes, we do really good. It's worth it to piss off a killer.
I sure could go for some microwaved fish... The terrible smell is worth it, I swear.
Looking good.
Hey! I did something right!
Poker's just luck, huh? Is there any point in being proud when I didn't do anything?
Is dating even viable in the fog? She lives off our emotions... could love be one of them? {small}Or lust?{!reset}
I can't overstate how great it is to be out of the fog! E-Even if I'll have to go back...
Even a guy like me got invited to strip poker. Take that, high school bullies!
Have you ever watched Trick 'r Treat, ~player~? They have this litle mascot scarecrow guy. Even when people are dying, I can't get over how cute he looks!
That's a relief...
H-Hey! Maybe some of Ace's luck did rub off on me!
You're making it hard for me to focus on my cards, ~player~...
D-Don't stare, I get nervous under pressure. Or, that sounds bad... I don't! I'm a good leader, I swear!
Oh, lucky break! Phew!
Don't be mad at me, but I think I'll survive a little longer.

Well, I am a survivor after all. Get it?
{small}Did that even make sense?{!reset}
Is Futurama still running? I loved that show. Well, before being taken and all...
It's nice to feel an emotion other than terror, even for a bit.
Once, I dreamed about a galaxy made of cotton candy... It was amazing. Uh, until Leatherface showed up and sawed me in half.
I wonder how many emails are in my inbox now...
Urgh, can I get something more definitive?
Yawn... Oh, sorry. I'm not bored, I swear! I could just use some rest...
I believe there'll be a day-- m-maybe tomorrow - where all the survivors are freed. It'll happen, I'm gonna make sure of it.
This'll probably be good enough.
I'll survive just fine, see?
Sure could go for some french fries right now...
Oh! Could I get something to eat here? Do they take bloodpoints?
Sadly, I can't seem to remember any of the cocky one-liners Ash likes to say. Otherwise, I'd look super badass!
All I need is to beat one person, then it's in the bag. Way easier than working on a generator.
The Entity sure loves to pick on me. "Here's that crummy elf outfit you hate so much, Merry Christmas". Give me a break!
Actually, did you know the cop in the original Scream movies was also named Dwight? Except he didn't... end up dying to Ghostface. {small}Uh, like I do, a lot...{!reset}
I keep rambling to you all, so I'm sorry about that. Uh, yeah. That's all I had to say.
Wanna see a card trick? I used to perform them at birthday parties!
It's a little funny, some of the survivors seem to go out of their way just for me to praise them. I know I'm the leader, but my opinion isn't that important.
Listen, I don't like country music. But in the fog, it's our only choice. Times are desperate, you know?
Aw, it's boring. Just like me.
"Professional" clothes can cost so much. It's kinda stupid... I need this job to have money, how am I supposed to afford a $30 tie before starting?
My back is killing me.. Did I sleep on it wrong? Or is it the fact I sleep on a wooden log?
I can't really hold my liquor, but I could really go for a drink right now. As long as it isn't moonshine, though.
Whenever I get too nervous, something sweet always calms me down. Chocolate, pastries, pudding... It's all great!
I once got stuck on the subway. I-I was too scared to ask anyone for directions, so I just sat there in this goofy orange cap. Humiliating, right?
You know, in Friday the 13th there was a group playing strip Monopoly. Could you imagine how slow and boring that had to be?
Huh!? What was that noise...?
What a boring set of cards...
We need to gather more offerings... I'll need to schedule out when to do that.
Meg's got these two braids in her hair, she says it helps her with running. Don't tell her I said this, but half the time I'm the one braiding her hair for her.
Being a leader means more than instructions in a trial. I have to worry about morale, chores, offerings... It can get to be a lot.
Would it be weird to tell David about this?
I'm definitely a cat person, even if I walked dogs one summer. Cats always seem to love me, and they're so soft!
Sometimes my words come out all weird. Even through all those customer service jobs, I can barely talk.
♫It burns my ears when they sing / "Everything you do is wrong! Everything you do- oooo! Hm hmm hm~♫
Sometimes I dream that I'm back at my office job, but I'm in my underwear and hiding in a locker. What could it mean?
Sometimes just thinking about relaxing at home and eating pizza is enough to get me through the day... Well, I'll have to escape first, but still!

When Scream was really big, people would call PizzaWhat! in that stupid Ghostface voice.
"I'll gut you like a fish!"
Yeah, just do it quick. I'm on break in twenty minutes.
Oops! Sorry, I dwelfed up.
I can't let my guard down. Who knows if someone is hiding around that corner...?

It'll be aldwight.
{small}Get it?{!reset}
Typical for me...
Rgh... Screw me!
I wonder if Ghostface and I could ever be friends. We both love classic horror movies, and... Actually, scratch that, he's a jerk no matter what.
It's weird having my heart beat so fast for reasons other than a killer nearby.
Oh, see... I can... I can try and do a card trick with these... Oh, I think I just creased that one. Sorry.
Are you a french fries with ranch, or a french fries with ketchup ~player.ifMale(guy|girl)~, ~player~? It can say a lot about a person, you know.
The Entity's Realm sucks, don't get me wrong, but it's better than High School.
One thing I'd tell my younger self? Head up, little guy! It doesn't get better, {b}it gets worse.{!reset}
Gotta stop talking about food... I'm not a glutton, or anything. It's just so comforting to eat something sweet...
I wasn't invited as a joke, right, ~player~? Cause I usually don't get invited to anything... Especially things where I strip naked.
You know what would rock? Having a chainsaw arm, like Ash used to! Well, it could complicate some stuff... But I think it's worth it!
I've stepped in bear traps, I can survive some bad cards.
It's so nice here. No screaming, or... I guess someone could scream in pleasure, or something. Was that weird to say?
I was a dog walker one summer. There was this big dog named Treasure. God, she'd drag me on the pavement for as long as she felt.
A-Are you mad at me? Sorry, ~player~. I'm really sorry...
Gah! I think I just saw a spider! Is She trying to spy on me?
Come on, I need to relax more. Mellow out, have some fun... {small}Deep breaths, like Claudette taught me.{!reset}
No matter how bad your life gets, never work as a mall elf. I wanted to burn that entire outfit, as well as those stupid plastic ears.
I'm man enough to admit it... When I was in high school, I was obsessed with Nine Inch Nails. I had all their CDs...
I don't get out much. Besides all those stupid realms filled with hooks, I mean.
I couldn't go a day without coffee back at my office job. Now look at me! I haven't had any in six years.
Y-You know, you're looking at Phil's Petrol's MVP. Nobody could... stand there... and pump gas, uh, like I could!
Some advice, avoid a movie called Thankskilling. It's an hour of misery and shitty gore. I can't believe I spent money to rent it!

Cards bad. Details later.
G-Get it? Like Herbert West? Re-Animator? {small}Anyone...?{!reset}

When I was a pizza boy, they'd send me down all these shady alleys and freaky backroads...
"30 minutes or it's free, Dwight! Move your ass!"
Everyone keeps telling me to be more confident in myself, but it just isn't that simple. Though, the praise is nice to hear.
Leadership is exhausting... I was just an office drone, it's not like I'm super smart or anything, either.
Oh, what a bunch of shit... Can I have a redo?
Fuck...
My hair used to be a bit longer, but like this it's so much easier to maintain, you know?
I've been trying to look in the bright side lately. Like, this one time after I got mugged I saw this big rainbow in the sky. It had me smiling the whole time I limped home!
One time a guy flirted with me by saying he wanted to display my head on a shelf. W-What the hell is that supposed to mean? At least he found me handsome...
I hope all these bad stories don't freak you out, ~player~. It's not karma or anything! I think I'm just unlucky.
Shit, I bit my fingers too much... I think my pointer is bleeding. None of you feed on blood, right?
Sorry if I seem on edge, I just can't get used to relaxing. If I do, then I'll let my guard down and hold everyone back.
I remember my Dad making me try out for all these sports in high school. Of course, the jocks were pissed! Man, they'd leave me in a locker for the whole game.
I hope I'm not making anyone feel bad... I'm just really nervous by nature, I can't help it!
Idiot... idiot... idiot...
Are slasher movies still being released in the real world? I'm kinda hoping they just let Jason die. Nothing will top him going to space in Jason X.
Buh... B-Bobobo....?
Oh my god-- She's so cute! I don't get to see many animals aside from crows... So this is a real treat for me!
You hear whispers too? Mine are always told by crows...
N-No thank you... Um, sorry. I appreciate it, but, uh... I don't think I'm worth wasting paint on.
(...There's no way this guy is really illiterate.)
(The hell's wrong with this girl!?)
Since when did Jason wear skinny jeans and a camisole? Have you seen the films?
Um, don't get too cocky with winning, ~leader~... I've come back from worse!
O-Oh god! This is just like Black Christmas... N-Nobody answer that phone, got it!?
Gah! I-It's the perfect setup for Black Christmas... Nobody answer the phone, and maybe Billy will leave us alone?

J-Just... checking the surroundings.
(Is anyone looking...? Everyone seems to say my butt is my best asset...)

"A'ight, wots all 'is den? Couple a' shite cards!"
Hahahaha! F-Funny, right? Right...?
Or... M-Maybe not. "Hey guys, want to play strip poker?" Yeah, Dwight, real smooth... {small}Idiot.{!reset}
Uh, make sure David doesn't know I told you all that. He'd get all mad that I broke his "fighter persona". Heheheh!
Uh, don't tell David I said all that. He'd get all mad that I "ruined his fighter persona". Hehehe!
What do you want for Christmas, ~player~? I'll tell Santa directly. It's my life's only purpose as an elf!
There's these videos online of cats meowing to Christmas carols-- they're sooo cute!
My dad once got me a Ghostface action figure. My mom got so mad over it, she made me throw it away.
Not to brag or anything, but I had the esteemed role of Present #2 in my middle school Christmas play. If you want an autograph, all you have to do is ask.
The tights I first had were way too sheer and clingy... I ended up ripping them in, like, a day.
Winter is... fine. I don't hate the cold or anything, but it makes me feel all slow.
Driving on icy roads was such a pain in the ass! You know, that's one thing I'm grateful to be done with.
Oh, you know my favorite ice breaker? Asking what people like on their pizza! I'm a mushroom and pepperoni guy myself, but any pizza is good pizza!
I really need to stop chewing on my nails, b-but I just can't help it. I get so nervous sometimes. Does anyone else have any nervous habits, or am I crazy? Heh...
(Man... I can't believe I'm having this hard of a time just talking. I'm so confident in trials, why can't I handle a simple conversation?)
I have to calm down... But my heart won't stop racing with her nearby! T-This isn't fair...
You keep snickering at me! Of course it's making me nervous, what else would you expect?
It just sorta happened. I mean, I spent all of high school hiding from bullies. It came in handy, and people started listening to me.
Wh-- It's not like I can help it! I know, it's much cuter for girls... But I can't just switch it off or something!
T-That's good, right? Blending in is good... It means I won't get put on a meat hook...
I don't think America lives up to what you expect. Or, at least, I lived in a pretty bad part.
I mean, I have a hard time believing it too. I don't know, maybe I just work better under extreme pressure.
Y-You think I'm handsome? Aren't you like... some super famous and adorable idol? How do you think...?
Huh? Oh... I-I'm fine. I just wanna be prepared in case a killer jumps out! Haha...
Huh? Oh... D-Don't worry about me! I just wanna make sure we're prepared in case a serial killer pops out!
Swordsmanship... I don't think I'm nimble enough for that. What would happen if the other guy knocked off my glasses?
Um, I don't know if I'm nimble enough for swordsmanship... I don't think I can even touch my toes.
Uh... N-No. Or-- I mean... I don't think so...? Uh...
Hey, I can't answer that! I love all you guys, you know? Leaders can't pick favorites!
Uhh... A huge doormat, really. I just took shit from my boss and let my coworkers step on me. I'd get home and eat a bunch of junk food to try and feel better.
I'm more into music than anything. I had a PlayStation, but I didn't play it a ton. I was way too tired after work.
Just, uh... trying to relax for a little bit. And, well... See some new people.
Well, uh... You hunt, right? Bear traps, running through the forest with a w-weapon...

condition.saying: So which is your least favorite to face, anyway?

case.state: Trapper, no question! I'm pretty sure he has it out for me... He always uses those stupid one use moris on me. Also, he breathes like a horse.
Steve, you know I didn't... We met at the campfire, remember? I was the first one to greet you.
Yep. What about it?
Man, I've got no idea either! It's like some weird part of our brains woke up, and all it knows is connecting wires.
I worked in an office. Not much to it... I sat on my ass all day staring at a screen.
Ah-- L-Leon! Yeah, you too!
Wh-- Huh!? Why are you suddenly interested in me and David...?
Uh-- I appreciate your patience. I know I can be a little slow... so I'm thankful you understand, Barbara.
Are you serious!? T-Three in a row?
I'm really doing my best, I swear! How do I keep losing!?
There's no way... W-Were the cards messed with or something? You all really did just want to humiliate me!
Well, now you know. I was a mall elf one Christmas. I was, uh, sick of getting no presents.
Hey... Come on guys, aren't we friends? What about all the toolboxes I gifted you, ~survivor~?
Sucks that I lost, but it's great that you guys won!
A ~background.time~ out of The Fog... I should really value this before I'm back to getting shoved on a meathook.
No big deal, I doubt I'll stay in the lead much longer.
Oh, m-me? Well, okay...
You don't have to pretend to be interested, it'll just be something small.
What can I do to stay in the lead? Come on, Dwight...
O-Oh, alright! Uh, if you insist... {small}Or, well, you aren't insisting anything. It's just the rules of the game and all that--{!reset}
Um, I'll stay positive. I lost-- but that's o-okay! I just have to show you all my... {small}uh...{!reset} N-No big deal at all!
Yeah, you all are probably mad at me anyways... I-I'll get right to stripping, then.
S-Sure, I'll get to it... Uh, sorry about being in the lead, and all that.
M-Me? Alrighty... I'll get right to it.
I'll get some extra points if I'm bold, so I'll get right to it.
Still doing better than Legion, that's all that matters. Hahaha! {small}Please don't hurt me.{!reset}
Yeah, I'll get to it, then.
It's no big deal.
Try not to die of boredom. I don't think I have anything interesting to remove...
Am I up again? A-Alright... I'll try and make this quick for you all.
I don't mind losing again. Uh, if anything, these boxers are feeling a bit tight.
Uh, that's fine... D-Don't make fun of me though, okay?
Heheh... I-I guess I lost again.
I lost again?
Should've seen it coming...
It feels so nice to lose here! The stakes are so low... Nobody is going to stab me! That's so nice!
Every game needs a loser, it's only natural I fill that role!
I'm pretty sure I'll live without my smaller stuff. I just hope it doesn't get lost.
Uh, it's no worries. Losing comes natural to me, anyways.
Losing here is so nice! There's no meat hooks, and I get to get out of these office clothes!
O-Okay! {small}Man up, Dwight. You can do this...{!reset}
Ah... I-I guess my best wasn't enough. Just, keep your snickering to yourself, okay?
Of course I would do this bad... Who would expect anything else from me?
Y-Yeah, I know I lost... Um, just give me a second, okay?
This is kinda embarrassing...
D-Don't get a big head or anything, Legion. Unlike your leader, I don't have a tantrum over every loss.
Um... Is she staring at me? W-Would you tell me, ~player~? I can't focus on my cards with her there...
Yes! If I'm sticking out, a killer will find me and stick me on a meat hook! So I'll happily continue to blend into the background.
O-Oh... You were kidding. I think I find flirting scarier than anything the entity can throw at us, heh...
...Unless you're making fun of me. That's what pretty and popular guys do...
You're sorry? Geez, you back down easily. If you're gonna try and be mean to me, at least stick to it.
W-What are you talking about? I didn't even say anything! Besides, don't you think David could do better than me?

condition.saying: Well, it's just... Where I'm from, those guys are from movies

case.state: I... I'm not sure. I mean, I remember watching Halloween in High School, and now... Michael's like, actually killing us.
Oh-- Uh, I was really into... ahem... {small}emo music.{!reset} But, um, I also really like stuff from the 80's!
I was really into emo music... But, uh, I also like stuff from the 80's!
...Oh. Well, my favorite survivor is probably Trish Jarvis. She's super resourceful, and put up a super tough fight against Jason.
I'm trying to mellow out, really... I know it's lame to say, b-but... I'm still getting used to people respecting me.
Uh, like what reasons? If that isn't too personal to ask.
Barbara... Thanks. T-That means a lot to hear, really. I hope I can make you happy too.
Ah... I can't say no to you. We've earned a day off anyway, right? Best to enjoy it as much as we can.
Oh... Well, thank you. That's really sweet of you to do. Um, are you sure you don't want something in return?
O-Oh... Thank you, Okino. It's really sweet of you to do that. Uh, you're sure you don't want anything in return? I could give you a toolbox!
This was probably the worst job I ever had. Santa had it easy. He just sat there and said "ho ho ho" every now and again.
I couldn't even get myself something nice after the contract ended. Someone hit my car in the mall parking lot.
I guess some teenager hit my car in the parking lot, because the paint was all screwed up when I got off my last shift.
Sorry, I can't help but complain. Retail really changes the way you view the Holidays.
Sorry, retail kinda changes how your view the holidays. I mean, I can't stand Christmas songs cause of it. It's a bit sad to think about.
Have you ever seen it, ~player~? Silent Night, Violent Night, I mean. It's the one where the guy goes nuts after seeing Santa?
Um, have you ever seen it, ~player~? Silent Night, Violent Night. Where the guy goes on a killing spree after seeing Santa?
Um... So did you ever have a favorite gift? I never got much. Maybe I was naughty, haha...
Sorry for like, constantly whining about Christmas, by the way... I never really got presents, and nobody celebrated with me when I got older.
I'm gonna look ridiculous. But that's the fun of it, right? You can laugh at the naked elf, ~player~.
Does that sound weird? I really do get stuck on meathooks... sacrificed to this weird spider god over and over. You believe me, right?
Hopefully it isn't too weird to play with me. I mean, I think we've seen each other in worse positions than naked, though...
Before being taken by The Fog, I don't think I had really any friends. Just a bunch of s-shitty jobs and bad coworkers.
There has to be some new ways to raise the morale of other survivors. How about I dress as a cheerleader and shout for everyone?
Can you believe I've got a big guy like David listening to me? When he first arrived, he scared the shit out of me.
I don't know how I did it... I've even got a big guy like David listening to my orders. Guys like him are meant to deck geeks like me right in the face!
This thing is so ratty now. I got it secondhand to begin with... Can you believe how expensive ties are?
The Entity has a weird way of getting you into its realm. I got taken after passing out drunk in front of my boss. Guess I had to be humiliated one last time.
I guess I could tell you all about generators and exit gates. But, to be honest, I'd rather not think about those right now.
I'm a guy, so I know showing my chest shouldn't be a big deal... {small}I mean, David barely knows what a shirt is.{!reset} Just, ugh... Sorry.
I know, I know... It isn't a big deal since I'm a guy. But it's hard for me, okay?
Shit, I think the fly got stuck... Come on, Dwight. Get it together!
This is kinda exciting... Even though I doubt anyone is interested in me.
Y-Yeah, sorry...
Don't expect anything great. If anything, you should look at someone else.
In The Fog, my watch doesn't work. Or... Actually, I think I sat on it like a week before I was taken. That's probably what killed it.
You think I'm crazy, huh? I'm not! It's all true, I swear on my CD collection!
Whatever helps you sleep at night...
I... I guess so. Sorry-- I didn't mean to assume that about you. Shit, now I've made it all awkward.
Ah-- T-Thank you, Okino. I'd like that too, I-I think. I'm just not so used to strangers treating me with respect...
Cause like... To Ash, he's a real person... But to us, he's fictional. If I think too hard about it, I start to doubt if I'm actually real.
Ah... Yeah, hopefully. I'll try not to let you down.
I won't deny you're a huge help. I mean, when you had that chase that lasted four gens? That was awesome! And, well, I do enjoy your company, Cheryl.
Hey, don't look so annoyed! How am I supposed to know what flirting sounds like when my first girlfriend dated me for a joke?
Y-You're gonna tell all your killer friends about this, aren't you? J-Just to embarrass me. Well, I don't care! Stare all you want, m-monster!
I-I bet you'll tell all your killer friends about this, huh? W-Well, I don't care! Stare all you like, y-you... monster!
Yeah. Leave everything to the elves! I guess it's all below Santa's pay rate. Even though he made twice as much as me.
Ugh, deep breaths... I don't wanna get all worked up. It's in the past, and I'll never have to work there ever again.
That was the best gift of all. New scratch marks, all over my beat-to-shit car. {small}Stupid fucking mall.{!reset}
Maybe I'd be more into the Holidays if I had friends to spend it with back then. I liked watching Silent Night, Violent Night, though.
I kinda get it. Like, going nuts after seeing Santa. The mall Santa was such a jerk to me. He told me my tights ripped cause I was too fat for them. Rude, right?
Oh-- I... I didn't mean to match my underwear to my outfit. I just happened to have a pair of green briefs...
I, uh, like celebrating like this, though. It's bold, and really fun. If not a little weird. Heheh...
Completely naked, but keeping plastic elf ears on. Is that not the dorkiest thing ever?
But being the leader in there... Well, I, uh, don't think I'm the best pick for leader. {small}Maybe Meg is a better choice.{!reset} There're so many people I can call my friends, now.
Not to get all dark, h-haha! Sorry, too much, right? Uh... Yeah. Anyways! I took off my watch and all that...
I'm not crazy, okay? Listen, I'll get out of that hell eventually-- all of us will.
...That was a joke. You were supposed to laugh.
But, well, David's a pretty big softie. He's doing good keeping his anger under control, you know?
Well, David's a great guy underneath. You know, he really likes to sing together!
